description: [Magic Hound](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0059) has created local accounts named `help` and `DefaultAccount` on compromised machines.(Citation: DFIR Report APT35 ProxyShell March 2022)(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)
